channel.title: When You Die You Drop ALl your items! and others
channel.description:
yeah hi guys, im kind of new to moparscape i have a server running but i have a problem.. when people die i want them to drop their stuff not keep it
and can anyone please give me (food eating) code? on my server you cant use food hehe. idk why lol i just need really help thanks a lot for anyone who will help =D
1 more thing! how do you add/change commands? like on my server when you run it, and click ::help it gives you commands,, how do i get rid of the commands and just put myself once like pickup and stuff!
my server ip is (192.168.0.100) if your wondering about testing it
